title: Capital: Critique of Political Economy, Vol 1: A Critical Analysis of Capitalist Production
description: The first of two volumes of "Capital" by Karl Marx, translated from the Fourth German Edition by Eden and Cedar Paul with a 1957 Introduction by G.D.H. Cole. Hardcover. Part of "Everyman's Library" which originally published it in two volumes in 1930; the first volume (this one) published in 1974 and the second in 1978.
author: Karl Marx
